an6.102:1.1: “Cha, bhikkhave, anisamse sampassamanena alameva bhikkhuna sabbasankharesu anodhim karitva aniccasannam upatthapetum.
an6.102:1.3: ‘Sabbasankhara ca me anavatthita khayissanti, sabbaloke ca me mano nabhiramissati, sabbaloka ca me mano vutthahissati, nibbanaponanca me manasam bhavissati, samyojana ca me pahanam gacchissanti, paramena ca samannena samannagato bhavissami’ti.
an6.102:1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cha anisamse sampassamanena alameva bhikkhuna sabbasankharesu anodhim karitva aniccasannam upatthapetun”ti.
